lines.text: Hey, you bloody Turk! Get lost, why don't you!
Hey, have you seen? He has bought old wine!

[on seeing the boats lying on the dry bed of the canal]
Why are they like that? What are they playing at?
Goodnight... Tomorrow we're gonna drive this boat like *hell*!
Just a fine way to say your evening prayers!

[Grabbing Lena by her tits]
Are you getting horny?

[Janne has driven the boat onto land and landed on the roof of a car]
How are you driving?
this is sabotage! This means war, dammit! They've gone and bloody crapped in the blue cupboard! This means war!

[eating food cooked by Sigurd]
Mmmm... this was really good! What is it?

[to Sigurd]
Escargots, what does that mean?
Snails! They prepared it this way in ancient Rome, on midsummer's eve.

[puts his plate away]
Could I have something to drink, please?
I've done some calculations on that...
